Job Posting:169575 - Position: F25 Cloud Engineer - Fall 2025 Co-op/Intern 169575B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Fall App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 05/23/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 05/09/2025 03:50 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country Definity Financial Corporation 111 Westmount Road South Waterloo N2J 4S4 ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION 2025 - Fall F25 Cloud Engineer - Fall 2025 Co-op/Intern 169575B Co-op Position Toronto, ON Canada 4 months Hybrid CAD 22.0 per hour for 0 Major List Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description YOUR NEXT CO-OP PLACEMENT Work term: Fall 2025 Work term length: 4 months From classroom to co-op to career, every step of your journey has an impact on your future. That's why it makes sense to choose a co-op placement with a company that offers truly rewarding work and real-life experience. At Definity®, your contributions, creativity, and energy will be put to good use, and you'll get to be involved with initiatives that support our strategic goals and use your skills in a supportive team environment. If you're looking for a company that takes care of its people - full time, part time, and co-ops alike - and has a track record of doing big things, get ready to love it here. What you'll be doing • Implementation of the desired architecture (cloud, on premise, and hybrid), products, and vendors to be used for programs across the enterprise and ensure they satisfy our business and technology needs • Implementation of cloud-focused principles and standards to guarantee a scalable, flexible, resilient, and secure environment for Economical/Definity • Work with Engineers/Developers from other teams to recommend and implement appropriate DevOps solutions • Continuously assist with identifying & implementing improvement • Assist teams with actively identifying & resolving technical issues & blockers Communicate status of assigned work & provide timely escalation of issues to ensure objectives are met • The hourly compensation for the role starts at $22/h and will increase based on factors including but not limited to, skills, education, experience, and the recommended rates as set by the respective educational institution. This role requires successful clearance of a background check (including criminal checks and leadership references). Job Requirements What you bring • Experience with application architectures, middleware, and technology platform architectures (cloud, on-premises, and hybrid) • Operations - Having built on the cloud, you also build and design for stability • Experience deploying full-stack solutions and building development capabilities on cloud platforms (AWS and GCP) • Familiar with technologies like Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Git, Python, Bash • Currently enrolled in a university or College Program Professional level cloud certification is a bonus • N/A Citizenship Requirement APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: Cloud Engineer - Fall 2025 Co-op/Intern in Toronto, , Canada | Definity Careers Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
